services.name: Founders-Led Expertise
services.description: Our company is led by three cofounders, each an expert in their domain—technology, product, and business. Being a part of tech teams in reputed brands, like Flipkart, Microsoft, Snapdeal, GoJek, and GoPay, our founders have delivered futuristic technologies that have shaped the success of these companies. With hands-on expertise across technology, product, and business, we build client teams and innovative tech products the same way we would build our own: high-caliber, cross-functional, and out

services.name: Rigorous Team Curation Process
services.description: When a new project comes in, we don’t assign people based on availability. We start by refining the job description in detail, bringing in collective insights from past work and domain knowledge. Our founders and senior leaders are directly involved in shaping every team, ensuring a precise fit. Every team we assemble is carefully curated because we treat every engagement like it’s our own product.

services.name: Deep Accountability
services.description: Our commitment doesn’t stop at kickoff. Founders stay involved throughout the engagement, tracking progress, checking in with clients, and ensuring each team member is delivering at their best. Feedback isn’t a quarterly formality; it’s a continuous loop we act on. Because when our clients are on the line, accountability isn’t optional. It’s built into every layer of what we do and how we do.

services.name: Rigorous Team Curation
services.description: Our selection process filters for not just top technical skill, but mindset, communication, and alignment with first-principles thinking.

services.name: High Ownership
